*10.09.2011*
 * Compare multiple IFC files
    ** This feature allows the user to compare multiple files at the level of number of IFC objects for each IFC class. 
      Demo link :[http://bci52.cib.bau.tu-dresden.de/ifcwebserver/ifc.rb?ifc_file=BIMBUZZ_Singapore2011_openbimlab_After_12_hours.ifc|BIMBUZZ_Singapore2011_openbimlab_After_16_hours.ifc|BIMBUZZ_Singapore2011_openbimlab_After_20_hours.ifc|BIMBUZZ_Singapore2011_openbimlab_After_24_hours.ifc&q=objects_list BIMBUZZ2011_OpenBIM_Lab] or as [http://bci52.cib.bau.tu-dresden.de/ifcwebserver/doc/ifcwebserver_simple_compare.png screenshot]
   ** How it works ?
  Select the files which u like to compare from the files list (click ctrl or shift to select them) then press "Go" button

{{{
    URL syntax:
    http://server/ifcwebserver/ifc.rb?ifc_file=file1.ifc|file2.ifc|...|fileN.ifc&q=objects_list
}}}

 * Add wiki page : [http://code.google.com/p/ifcwebserver/wiki/extensions How to extend/modfiy IfcWebServer to meet your needs]
